analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(_newTokenOwner) (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol#349-360) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol#354-356)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x1358efe5d9bfc2005918c0b2f220a4345c9ee7a3.sol)
